text: @GeraldoRivera @neeratanden @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Trump's Europe ban isn't actually going to slow the spread of #covid19 by any appreciable amount. The disease is already present in the US and spreading from within; imports from Europe are just a drop in the bucket.
